task.title: How to get living arrangements in PCB

context.p: We will need a place to stay for four nights in PCB.

step.cmd: Call the Edgewater Resort to make a reservation.

image.alt: Edgewater Resort in Panama City Beach

step.cmd: Give them your credit card information to hold your slot.
Check into the hotel when you get to PCB and drop your stuff off in your room.
